events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit as expected. I'd like to return it and get a refund.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to a product return.
Your case has been assigned to our refund specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us regarding your return. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still has all the tags attached.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund process. You should receive a full refund within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund case has been successfully closed from our side. Please check your account soon for the credited amount.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund for your returned jacket. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to fill out a short survey regarding your refund experience with us.
